Author: brother3
Title: [ANN][ICO][MGX] MegaX - Millennial Driven Cryptocurrency & Retail Network Token
Body: MegaX inks blockchain partnership with ARAW to push decentralised payments https://medium.com/@megaXcoin/megax-inks-blockchain-partnership-with-araw-to-push-decentralised-payments-df28a139a659 MegaX announces today that we have partnered with ARAW to take the decentralised e-commerce sector even further. This is yet another major push that will extend on MegaXâ€™s capabilities and influence in this sector.  ARAW provides end-to-end solutions for e-commerce marketplaces, touch & pay cryptocurrency cards, online crypto payments and unified reward systems on the Ethereum blockchain.  The strategic partnership will ensure that MegaX can ride on the technology advancements and tools that ARAW is building, as well as have MGX used as a payment/utility token on the ARAW platform, which includes banking integration, mobile wallet, crypto exchange integration, and touch-and-go card.  ARAW benefits from the extensive international brand network that MegaX, iFashion Group and its partners have forged, pushing immediate first adopters onto the ARAW platform(s). The ARAW token will also be accepted as a form of payment on the MegaXstore.  MegaX will airdrop a number of MGX tokens to the ARAW community, and both organisations will also swap a limited number of tokens between them to be equally incentivised for the future.

Author: jojonirrenm
Title: [ANN][ICO][MGX] MegaX - Millennial Driven Cryptocurrency & Retail Network Token
Body: MEGAX COMMUNITY PROGRAMME  As a way to reward our community, we are distributing 5% of all MGX Coins distributed in our Bounty Programme. The MGX Coins will be split according to points accumulated pro-rata between the participants.  At the end of the ICO, affiliates will be awarded their share of 5% of all MGX Coins distributed, with their points accumulated divided by total points accumulated from all participants.  i.e MEGA X raises 100,000 ETH, distributing 54,300,000 MGX Coins. Affiliate has 200 points out of total 100,000 points accumulated from the Affiliate Programme:  200 / 100,000 * 5% * 54,300,000 = 5430 MGX Coins    Articles  Submit your articles here after posting: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSemQY05TE8OoMLemw_8H7sokSu4rUCDPDR6L2WrEOSBLhrz5g/viewform  Guidelines: At least 300 words, flexible, depending on the platform Post needs to contain a link to www.megax.io Present original views or opinion on the project, reposts or translations will not be allowed Available publicly on the internet without any restrictions  Bounty: 100 points per article published 500 points if we share your article   Twitter  Submit your articles here after posting: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSemQY05TE8OoMLemw_8H7sokSu4rUCDPDR6L2WrEOSBLhrz5g/viewform  Guidelines: Needs to contain these hashtags: $MGX, $MEGAX and #MEGAX and/or mentions to @megaxcoin Follow our account @megaxcoin  Bounty: 1 point for accounts with 0-99 followers per tweet 5 points for accounts with 100-250 followers per tweet 10 points for accounts with 251-500 followers per tweet 15 points for accounts with 501-1000 followers per tweet 25 points for accounts with 1000+ followers per tweet   Video  Submit your articles here after posting: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSemQY05TE8OoMLemw_8H7sokSu4rUCDPDR6L2WrEOSBLhrz5g/viewform  Guidelines: Video length to be at least 1 min long Mention or redirect viewers to www.megax.io  Present original views or opinion on the project, reposts or translations will not be allowed Available publicly on the internet without any restrictions  Bounty: 100 point for accounts with 0-99 subscribers per video 250 points for accounts with 100-500 subscribers per video 350 points for accounts with 501-1000 subscribers per video 500 points for accounts with 1000+ subscribers per video    Affiliate Link  Get your unique affiliate link here: https://megax.tapfiliate.com/programs/pre-sale-refferal/signup/  Guidelines: In addition to any of the above channels, use your unique affiliate link sent to your email to attribute any signups to your account. There are two separate links, one for the pre-sale which will be sent to you immediately after signing up, and another link at a later date for the actual sale.  Bounty: 5 points per sign up for the pre-sale 25 points per sign up for the actual sale   Whitepaper Translation  Submit your request here: https://www.megax.io/contact/  Guidelines: Wait for confirmation from our staff before proceeding with translation Any language that is currently not translated yet  Bounty: 500 points per translation   Contact Points  Website: www.megax.io Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/megaxcoin/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/megaXcoin Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/GqWVP0NSpfTG1-YQYM8LeA  If you have any queries or need any clarifications, please forward your queries to our contact form: https://www.megax.io/contact/

Author: Gwaah
Title: [ANN][ICO][MGX] MegaX - Millennial Driven Cryptocurrency & Retail Network Token
Body: Hi all!  As advised by our counsel and as we await regulatory feedback, we have decided to set the sales dates to  Pre-sales: 9 Oct 2017 1800H (+8 GMT) - 16 Oct 2017 1800H (+8 GMT) Public Sales: 17 Oct 2017 1800H (+8 GMT) - 17 Nov 2017 1800H (+8GMT)  It is important to push the dates as we need to meet compliance fully to protect all initial purchasers of our tokens. We apologize for the delay as the landscape shifts and we are reacting to it positively. There will be no further push-backs, and we chose a date we are very comfortable with.  Apart from awaiting regulatory feedback, we will be making full use of this time to do a full PR release on major media and tech blogs. You will be hearing about us a lot from other channels. This is an e.g of one of our initial angles http://fintechnews.sg/11902/mobilepayments/mc-payment-cashless-proposal-singapore-hawker-cofee-shops/  For the many users who have indicated interest to purchasing, we will be contacting you nearer to the pre-sales date. Interested parties, do leave is your email via www.megax.io  We will be hosting a sharing on our token sales at an exclusive 'investors'* event on 7-8 Oct (http://www.singaporerendezvous.com)  Also, we will be accepting fiat payment for purchase of MegaX and are now drafting up instructions on how to transfer payment either through ethereum or fiat.  Best Regards, Jonathan.
